title: FuelBelt Helium Running Race Belt with Race Bib Locks and Storage
features: Lightweight racing belt for endurance runners; storage pouch holds keys or gel packs
Two micro race locks securely hold a race bib without the need for safety pins
Helium Hex-Foam construction promotes airflow for breathable comfort
Bounce-free unisex design with quick closure buckle fits any runner comfortably, easily adjusts even while wearing
Adjusts for waist sizes from 24 to 40 inches; weighs only 50 grams
description: The FuelBelt Helium Race Belt with Race Bib Locks and Storage is designed for race runners who want a streamlined belt with minimal storage, combining convenience and a lightweight design that wonâ€™t slow things down. Water-repellent Helium Hex-Foam material has hexagonally shaped air channels for breathability, providing optimum comfort and performance in warm weather. A water-resistant micro storage pouch conveniently and securely carries keys and energy gels while minimizing bulk. This belt is ideal for races, with two detachable micro race locks to securely hold a race bib without the need for safety pins that may damage clothing. Reflective accents provide extra visibility when running on cloudy days or for those early morning or late evening races. The bounce-free unisex design fits comfortably, with a quick-closure buckle and straps that are easy to adjust even while wearing. The FuelBelt Helium Race Belt with Race Bib Locks and Storage is adjustable for waist sizes from 24 to 40 inches and is the lightest racing belt in the FuelBelt line, weighing only 50 grams.
